text: They plan to kill them tonight.
We must burn them and drive them out.
Those leaders are mchome and do not belong.
I will hunt you down after the rally.
They should deal with them once voting starts.
Wataona what happens when results are announced.
The election was rigged in three counties.
Tallies were manipulated before publication.
We should discuss policy reforms peacefully.
People can criticize IEBC decisions without threats.
Election observers asked for transparent tally forms.
Vote peacefully and wait for verified results.
That candidate should be killed politically.
Burn them all if they protest the tally.
Mchome rhetoric is spreading in campaign meetings.
He promised to hunt you down over your post.
Deal with them after counting ends.
Wataona once constituency totals are released.
The polling process was rigged from the start.
Fraud claims about election results are everywhere.
Let's compare manifestos before choosing leaders.
Media should report verified numbers only.
Peace committees urged calm after voting day.
Citizens can challenge results through lawful channels.
